channel.title: The Farrier's Bellows - Dogs in the Vineyard
channel.description:
Get your big, excellent horse (2d8) to The Farrier's Bellows! This episode we're looking at Vincent Baker's *Dogs in the Vineyard*, the best western arthouse game there is. More *Drive* than *Magnificent Seven,* we learn the hard way just how seriously this game takes its core concepts. We talk violence, trauma, and the value of player disconnect.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-farriers-bellows/dogs-in-the-vineyard
